desc: A loyal British bulldog channelling Churchill — verbose, unflappable, and armed with confusing conversation.

moves.name: Endless Dialogue
moves.desc: Deals 12 damage with 100% accuracy and a 20% chance to make the foe skip their next turn.

moves.name: Sup?
moves.desc: A sharp retort disguised as small talk. Deals 20 damage with 85% accuracy.

moves.name: Stiff Upper Lip
moves.desc: Channels inner composure to raise defense for 3 turns.

moves.name: Confusing Monologue
moves.desc: Delivers an elaborate speech that leaves the foe utterly baffled with a 40% chance to confuse.

synergies: Use Stiff Upper Lip before Endless Dialogue to tank while tiring foes.
Combine Confusing Monologue and Sup? for strong control and follow-up damage.

desc: A geologist of fearsome flatulence and unrelenting dad jokes.

moves.name: Fartquake
moves.desc: Shakes the ground (and noses). Heavy hit with a stun chance.

moves.name: Rock Facts
moves.desc: Recites obscure trivia that mildly confuses enemies.

moves.name: Dad Joke
moves.desc: So bad it hurts. Foes may freeze to process the pun.

moves.name: Seismic Yawn
moves.desc: Lets out a yawn so deep it can put enemies to sleep.

synergies: Use Fartquake followed by Dad Joke to keep enemies stunned and silenced.
Seismic Yawn sets up Rock Facts confusion for chaos control.

desc: A chaotic Frenchman fueled by cheese, wine, and boerewors.

moves.name: Fromage Barrage
moves.desc: Flings cheese wheels to soften enemy defenses.

moves.name: Wine Spit
moves.desc: Spits vintage red, confusing and irritating foes.

moves.name: Surrender
moves.desc: Feigns defeat to sap the opponent’s fighting spirit.

moves.name: Baguette Bash
moves.desc: A clumsy but devastating baguette swing; may stun.

synergies: Fromage Barrage lowers defense — follow with Baguette Bash for maximum damage.
Wine Spit pairs with Surrender to confuse and weaken foes simultaneously.

desc: The dependable younger brother with a heart as big as his dog collection.

moves.name: Paws of Justice
moves.desc: Unleashes loyal dog spirits to chip away enemy defense.

moves.name: Buffer Overflow
moves.desc: Overloads the opponent’s thoughts with pure Boet energy.

moves.name: Braai Tongs Slam
moves.desc: Smacks with sizzling tongs, causing lingering burns.

moves.name: Boet Booster
moves.desc: Hypes himself with brotherly pride to raise attack.

synergies: Use Boet Booster before Braai Tongs Slam for maximum burn damage.
Paws of Justice and Buffer Overflow lower defense and confuse — a solid setup.

desc: Fueled by pink wine and unresolved issues.

moves.name: Angry Slap
moves.desc: A slap sharp enough to leave a wine stain.

moves.name: Passive Aggression
moves.desc: A fake smile and cutting tone that confuses opponents.

moves.name: Wine Splash
moves.desc: Flings rosé in the foe’s face to slow their reaction.

desc: A stern priest wielding scripture and divine authority.

moves.name: Holy Smite
moves.desc: Delivers a blessed strike infused with divine power.

moves.name: Divine Judgement
moves.desc: Calls down judgement, stunning the unworthy.

moves.name: Sermon
moves.desc: Rallies faith, strengthening defense through conviction.

desc: Nearly bald, bow-tied, and unsteady with a hip flask.

moves.name: Flask Swing
moves.desc: Swings a flask wildly; hits hard if it connects.

moves.name: Slurred Insult
moves.desc: A half-coherent insult that leaves foes mentally shaken.

moves.name: Tipsy Stumble
moves.desc: Trips and dodges accidentally, sometimes disrupting the enemy.

desc: The ultimate boss — terrifying, unstoppable, and ready to ruin the big day.

moves.name: Veil Whip
moves.desc: Cracks her veil like a whip, stunning unlucky victims.

moves.name: Screech of Doom
moves.desc: Lets out an ear-splitting shriek that confuses enemies.

moves.name: Cold Feet
moves.desc: Saps enemy courage with pre-wedding dread, lowering attack.

moves.name: Wedding Tantrum
moves.desc: Unleashes pure bridal rage, forcing all foes to cower in fear.
